channels: (list) A list of channels to /JOIN on connect
channels.autorejoin.delay: (int) How long to wait in seconds before rejoining, 0 to disable
channels.autorejoin.harass: (bool) Whether to rejoin and kick the kicker (Requires Oper)
channels.autorejoin.harass_message: Wow, that's pretty fucking rude mate!
channels.autorejoin.on_kick: (bool) Whether to autorejoin a channel when kicked
command_trigger: (str) The character string used to trigger commands
enabled: (bool) True if this connection is to be started
host: (str) Address of the IRC server to connect to
nickname.alt: (str) Alternative nickname to use when main is taken
nickserv.nick_in_use: (str/None) What to do when username is in use, alt_nick or ghost
nickserv.password: (str/None) The password to authenticate to NickServ with
plugins: (list) A list of plugins to load
plugins.account: Handles user authentication to the bot
plugins.account.salt: (str) Salt to use when salting user passwords
plugins.bacon: To cook bacon for someone, use @bacon
plugins.bible: Provides the King James v3 Bible
plugins.bible.database: (str) Path to the sqlite3 King James Bible file
plugins.choice: Picks a random item from a comma delimited list
plugins.eightball: Ask the magic 8ball a question and recieve an answer!
plugins.exec: Exec executes a given python string
plugins.exec.permission_levels.exec: (int) Required level to exec raw python
plugins.fapget: Provides a random list of things for people to @fapget to
plugins.fapget.fap_allowed: (list) A list of complete IRC hosts that are allowed to add faps
plugins.general.permission_levels.join: (int) Required level to have bot join a channel
plugins.general.permission_levels.part: (int) Required level to have bot part a channel
plugins.general.permission_levels.quit: (int) Required level to have bot quit the server
plugins.general.permission_levels.reload: (int) Required level to reload bot plugins
plugins.help: Provides @help for all plugins and config settings
plugins.insult: Polls insultgenerator.org for a random insult.
plugins.lastseen: Stores the last time a user has been seen
plugins.lastseen.blacklist: (list) List of channels to not record
plugins.lastseen.database_path: (str) Path to the database, use :memory: to not save to disk
plugins.prettyprinter: pretty prints a formatted IRC message to the controlling terminal
port: (int) Port of the IRC server to connect to
reload.wait: (int) The number of seconds to wait when being reloaded
ssl: (bool) True if using SSL to connect
